hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Huge Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Megaton Hammer# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #the Biggoron Sword#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #fairy outside Ganon's Castle# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to the #Goron Ruby#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #2# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Strength Upgrade#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: I love to gossip! Wanna be friends?

HC (Malon).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Kokiri Forest# is a foolish choice.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Can you move me? I don't get great service here.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to the #Kokiri Emerald#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Blue Potion Bottle#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that shooting #the sun# grants #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Boomerang# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Darunia's dance# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to the #Zora Sapphire#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals a #generic grotto#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #1# major item.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals #Wolfos# guarding a chest.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Red Rupee# and #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Deku Stick#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Poe Bottle#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Poe Bottle#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Volvagia# holds...^ #a Blue Potion Bottle# and #the Blue Fire Arrows#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# hoards #a Dodongo's Cavern Compass#.
